channel.title: Graph gallery
channel.description: A tutorial on effective visual communication for the quantitative scientist.

item.title: Clear lines - clear signal*
item.dc:creator: Graphics principles
item.description: *Based on the chapter “Clean lines, clear signal” in the textbook: “The Wall Street Journal Guide to Information Graphics: The Dos and Don'ts of Presenting Data, Facts, and Figures.” Dona M. Wong. December 16, 2013. ISBN: 978-0-393-34728-9.
